channel.title: Milk Bone Framework V1 (Blakescape/Winterlove Rework)
channel.description:
[CENTER] Milk Bone Framework, is basically the Original Winterlove Framework, with modifications, such as, packaging, class indentation fixes, and a few modifications, works just about the same as the Original Winterlove Framework. I made this so people could read the damned source; Milk Bone Framework was made using netbeans 7.2.1.
First of all, ClientHandler subclass of Server.java file, was Renamed to UserHandler, UserHandler does not contain code in the run() method, from UserHandler. Instead, I created a new class that implements the UserHandler class, since the UserHandler still contains its static fields. The UserHandlerImpl class contains the the run() methods code, to shorten up the class "UserHandler". Soon in the next version, the Cryption class, might get renamed to "Key" or "KeyCodec", or "CodecKeyGen"; the login field will have a new class of its own, whilst being reworked. The "stream" class has been renamed to "Stream" for grammar corrections. The "MilkBone" class will serve as a replacement class for the main method to be used in. Soon, I will modify the "Server" class's constructor to "Server(boolean membersOnly, int port)" which will allow to set whether the server is a Members Only server, and allowing the server to be hosted on different ports while running the one simple class.
Media:
[img]http://puu.sh/1oWlD[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/1oW9R[/img]
Download:
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?y0cdrsr5z8asrzy]Milk Bone.zip[/url]
Use any normal 317 client to connect to it.
Credits:
Creator of Winterlove. Daiki (W.E his name is.) Me (Extremely low amount) Netbeans
[/CENTER]
EDIT: I incidentally said Stream rather than Server on the constructor part.
Jagex does not deserve credit, as they didn't create any of the code, only the structure in which the server handles requests.

[/quote][/quote]

You didn’t read the whole thing, anyways, I’m working on upgrading its Stream to a ByteBuffer, and I am going to find a new Cryption method for this. I am working on it overall, and this is just the version 1. Don’t try to be smart, actually be smart. God I hate faggots like you.
